vpsissvtnfAdvConfig Struct Reference
VPS Driver API » VPS - Common API » LDC Config API

#include <vps_cfgvtnf.h>

Detailed Description

Advanced configuration parameters of VTNF.

struct vpsissvtnfAdvConfig

Field Documentation

uint32_t vpsissvtnfAdvConfig::blockHeight

Block Height, must be multiple of 4 and up to 128

uint32_t vpsissvtnfAdvConfig::blockWidth

Block width, must be multiple of 16 for YUV420 and multiple of 32 for YV12 formats and upto 512

uint32_t vpsissvtnfAdvConfig::colorWeight1

Weight used for adjusting contribution of luma and chroma difference

uint32_t vpsissvtnfAdvConfig::colorWeight2

Weight used for adjusting contribution of luma and chroma difference

uint32_t vpsissvtnfAdvConfig::intrEnable

Flag to enable/disable Interrupt, 0: disables interrupt 1: Enable interrupt Supported in HAL Unsupported in driver - will be forced to 1

uint32_t vpsissvtnfAdvConfig::lut1[VPS_ISS_VTNF_LUT_SIZE]

Lookup table contining alpha blending values to blend the previous frame output and current frame input for Luma

uint32_t vpsissvtnfAdvConfig::lut2[VPS_ISS_VTNF_LUT_SIZE]

Lookup table contining alpha blending values to blend the previous frame output and current frame input for Chroma

uint32_t vpsissvtnfAdvConfig::roundBitCount

Bit count by which combined SAD value is rounded down to get the LUT index

vpsissvtnfTriggerSrc_t vpsissvtnfAdvConfig::triggerSource

VTNF Trigger Source Supported in HAL Unsupported in driver - will be forced to ISSHAL_VTNF_TRG_SRC_HWSEQ
